name: assign_valueTo_hmi
action: [IF]([LIKE](<*VALUE(CE_Selected_Products)*>,Experion Enterprise System)){<*ALLOWATTRIBUTES(Is HMI Engineering in Scope?)*>[IF]([EQ](<*CTX( Container(Labor_details_newexapnsion_cont2).Row(1).Column(Is HMI Engineering in Scope).GetDisplayValue)*>,Yes)){<*SELECTVALUE(Is HMI Engineering in Scope?:Yes)*>}{<*SELECTVALUE(Is HMI Engineering in Scope?:No)*>}[ENDIF]}{<*DISALLOWATTRIBUTES(Is HMI Engineering in Scope?)*>}[ENDIF]
